title: genetic_info
description: Array of genetic information for the respective study population.

items.title: genetic
items.description: Compound information block. Create one for all compounds (analytes and administered compounds).

value.description: Value of the parameter. E.g., 'PM', '*1/*2' or 'rs4244285'.

percentage.description: Percentage of the population possessing the respective genotype or phenotype.

method.description: Method of determination for the genetic parameter. E.g., 'dextromethorphan/dextrorphan urinary metabolic ratio' or 'PCR-RFLP'.
